name.short: CCS replacement with cpdavd and notification to CCS users to reconfigure calendar clients
name.long: CCS replacement with cpdavd and notification to CCS users to reconfigure calendar clients

content.abstract: In cPanel & WHM version 120, we replaced the Calendar and Contacts Server (CCS) plugin with the cpdavd service for CalDAV and CardDAV. If your server runs CCS, all email users with calendars must reconfigure their clients for compatibility with cpdavd. If you enable this notification and your server runs CCS, all email users with calendar data will receive an email with instructions on how to make this required change.
